description: Paul`s Garchomp was the second Pok√©mon sent out to battle and faced off against Ash`s Dragonite during the Training Battle at Oak`s Laboratory. It was meant to emulate Cynthia`s Garchomp in preparation for Ash Ketchum`s entry into the Masters Tournament. It defeated Ash`s Dragonite despite it using a new battle technique of flying towards it with Draco Meteor.
name: Gablias (Shinji)
